mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PY_PCR_CRS_CRT_BDI_LIS_ABI( UUID, CRT_TIME, CRT_USER, TRN_ID, ACCOUNT_NO, UNIT, CURRENCY, LOAN_ITEM, GUARANTEE_MODE, AUTHORIZED_AMOUNT, AMOUNT, STATUS, OPEN_DATE, MATURITY_DATE, PAYMENT_BEGIN_DATE, PAYMENT_PLAN, PAYMENT_MODE, INSTALLMENT_PLAN, INFO_DATE, APP_ID ) VALUES( sys_guid(), sysdate, #{crtUser}, #{trnId}, #{accountNo}, #{unit}, #{currency}, #{loanItem}, #{guaranteeMode}, #{authorizedAmount}, #{amount}, #{status}, #{openDate}, #{maturityDate}, #{paymentBeginDate}, #{paymentPlan}, #{paymentMode}, #{installmentPlan}, #{infoDate}, #{appId} )
